entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
